Package edu.university.apps

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication

        public StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method to start the Student Course Registration and Mark Entry Application (SCRAME). The method first initialize a StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object using loadSystem() method. If the method return null object it means that there is no data or the data file has been corrupted. Otherwise, it will read from the data file and initialize system from there.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        The method is used to execute the Student Course Registration and Mark Entry Application (SCRAME)

      • addStudent

        private boolean addStudent()
        This method is used to add student to the studentsRegistered ArrayList.
        Returns:
        false if student is already existing in the ArrayList, true if the student object has been added to the studentsRegistered ArrayList.

      • addCourse

        private boolean addCourse()
        This method is used to add courses to the courseList ArrayList.

        The user will be first asked to enter name of the course. Followed by the name of the professor. Since there are in total 3 combination of courses:

        • Course with lectures only
        • Course with both lectures and tutorials
        • Course with lectures, tutorials and laboratories
        The user will be asked whether the course have tutorials first. If one course does not have tutorials, it will definitely not have labs. Similarly, the user will also be asked whether a course have laboratories.

        For each of the tutorial and laboratory, the user will be asked the number of groups in tutorial and laboratory sessions and the corresponding number of people in each group. For lecture, we assume there is only one lecture group for each course, which makes logical sense.

        Returns:
        true when course is successfully registered in the system, false when the course has already been added.

      • registerStudentForCourse

        private boolean registerStudentForCourse()
        This method is used to register a student in a course. Based on whether a course has tutorials or labs, the method will prompt user to enter the group number the student want to register (for tutorial and laboratories) By default, a student will always be registered to the lecture group, since every course has a lecture (by assumption).
        Returns:
        true if a student has successfully registered for a course, false if there is
        • No registered students in the system
        • No courses recorded in the system
        • Student does not exist in the system
        • Student already has registered course
        • Course has no more vacancies

      • checkSlots

        private void checkSlots()
        The method is used to print the slots of a course as specified by the user.

      • printStudentList

        public void printStudentList()
        The method is used to print the registered students of a course by lecture group, tutorial group or lab group.

      • enterCourseWeightage

        private void enterCourseWeightage()
        This method is used to enter the assessment weightage of a course. By assumption, all courses have 2 main assessment components: coursework and examination, and there are only 2 cases:
        • Coursework does not have subcomponents
        • Coursework has 2 or more subcomponents
        The user is first asked the weightage of examination, and coursework will naturally be 100 minus the weight of the examination. Then the user will be asked whether the coursework has/does not have subcomponents, and user will be prompt to under the weighage of each of the subcomponent.

      • enterCourseworkMark

        private void enterCourseworkMark()
        The method is used to enter the coursework mark of a student. The method will iterate through all the students registered for a course, and prompt user to enter the raw coursework mark if the coursework does not have subcomponent. In the case when coursework has subcomponents, the user will enter the raw subcomponent mark one by one for each of the registered student. The method does not check whether a student has already has his coursework mark entered. So each time the method is called, it will reenter the coursework mark for all students. Such assumption is made since normally the mark will only be entered once, that is at the end of each semester.

      • enterExamMark

        private void enterExamMark()
        The method is used to enter the examination mark of a student. The method will iterate through all the students registered for a course, and prompt user to enter the raw examination mark for a student. Similar to the enterCourseworkMark() method, this method does not check whether a student has already has his/her mark recorded. This is based on the assumption that examination will only be entered once, that is at the end of each semester.

      • printCourseStatistics

        private void printCourseStatistics()
        This method is used to print the statistics of a particular course. The method will only be able to run if all the students registered under a course have their marks entered.

      • printStudentTranscript

        private void printStudentTranscript()
        This method is used to print the transcript of a selected student. For a student, this method will print all the courses he has registered and those that have all the marks entered.

      • studentExists

        private boolean studentExists​(java.lang.String studentName)
        This method is used to check whether a particular student is registered in the system.
        Parameters:
        studentName - This is the name of student.
        Returns:
        true if the student is registered and false otherwise.

      • courseExists

        private boolean courseExists​(java.lang.String courseName)
        This method is used to check whether a particular course is registered in the system.
        Parameters:
        courseName - This is the name of the course.
        Returns:
        true if the course exists and false otherwise.

      • getProfessor

        private Professor getProfessor​(java.lang.String profName)
        This method is used to get access the professor object in/not in the system.
        Parameters:
        profName - This is the name of the professor.
        Returns:
        Professor object if the name of professor matches any of the record registered in the system. Otherwise, a new Professor (with name profName, the parameter of method) will be created in the method and returne.

      • getStudent

        private Student getStudent​(java.lang.String studentName)
        This method is used to access the student that is already registered in the system. This method access the student that is already registered. This means caution must be exercised when using the method, since it will return null if name of the student does not match any of the record. To select a student (safer), use the selectStudent() method.
        Parameters:
        studentName - This is the name of the student.
        Returns:
        Student (those who are already registered in the system) object.

      • getCourse

        private Course getCourse​(java.lang.String courseName)
        This method is used to access the course that is already registered in the system. This method access the course that is already registered. This means caution must be exercised when using the method, since it will return null if the coursename does not match any of the record. To select a course (safer), use the selectCourse() method.
        Parameters:
        courseName - This is the name of the course.
        Returns:
        Course (those who are already registered in the system) object.

      • selectCourse

        private Course selectCourse()
        This method is used to select course that is already registered in the system.
        Returns:
        Course (those who are already registered in the system) object with name specified by the caller of the method.

      • selectStudent

        private Student selectStudent()
        This method is used to select student who is already registered in the system.
        Returns:
        Student (those who is already registered in the system) object with name specified by the caller of the method.

      • printAllCourses

        private void printAllCourses()
        This method is used to print all the courses registered in the system with their respective course coordinator.

      • printAllStudents

        private void printAllStudents()
        This method is used to print all the students registered in the system.

      • saveSystem

        private void saveSystem()
        The method is used to serialize the state of the system. To be more specific, the method serializes the StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object.

      • loadSystem

        private static StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication loadSystem()
        The method is used to deserialize the state of the system.
        Returns:
        a StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object that is saved during the previous execution of the program, null if there is an IOException of ClassNotFoundException. This happens when the system binary file is corrupted or the structure of the program has been modified.
